__e: Our hero, Sherman McCoy, was about to make a simple phone call. But despite the existence of 11 phones and seven different lines in the 14 rooms of his $6-million-plus apartment this was a phone call he could not make at home.
I'm sitting here with Mr. Sherman McCoy.
Sherman McCoy was nothing like his father.
Come on, Sherman. You can do it.
But, Sherman, you don't know how to fly!
Really ? Sherman, you're ver special to me.
No, Sherman, I'll never let that happen.
Sherman, I don't know what's gotten into you, but ldon't like it at all!
Sherman, I've got to get you out of here before you touch yourself.
And, as with all things Sherman-related, I prepared for it.
